text: @realDonaldTrump Who cares about advertising right now? We're all worried about the deadly #COVID19 decimating our lives and the incompetent #impeached president who's completely at fault for neglecting to properly handle the situation. #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath #TrumpVirus
